fields.value: The Public as Thermostat: Dynamics of Preferences for Spending

dsDescriptionValue.value: The data sets thermo1.dat and thermo2.dat contain the data   necessary to replicate the analyses reported in an article written by   Christopher Wlezien, entitled "The Public as Thermostat: Dynamics of   Preferences for Spending." The article was published in the American  Journal of Political Science, vol. 39 (1995).

fields.value: Version Date: 1996-01-04Version Text: 1996-01-04Subject: Study Level Error Note, Notes: These data are part of ICPSR's Publication-Related   Archive and are distributed exactly as they arrived from the data   depositor.
